ability.name: Palm Reading
ability.description: * If you are Strong, every time you draw a card, if it is a Sword, deal 1 Damage. * If you are Fast, every time you draw a card, if it is a Cup, generate 1 Shield. * If you are Lucky, every time you draw a card, if it is a King or Queen, draw another card. * If you are Charming, every time you draw a card, if it is a Page or Knight, choose one ally: that ally regains 1HP. * If you are Clever, every time you draw a card, if it is a Wand, deal 1 Ranged Magic Damage.
ability.flavor: The trick with palm reading is to strike others with your palms and then read their faces.
